data: The narrow street known for many long years as the Charnier des Innocents (the Charnel-house of the Innocents), near the market, has always been noted for the large number of scriveners who have established their booths in this densely populated part of Paris.
Charnier des Innocents | Charnel-house of the Innocents | Paris
Avarice--Anger: Two of the Seven Cardinal Sins
